attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I belive it is extremely poor taste for the goverment to dictate to the public about tightning their belts when they are closing Parliment for 24 days over Christmas. could it mean that there is a lack of work for the goverment to do or does Gordan Brown want to hush things through goverment without the criticsm of the goverment - either way it appears to be a clandestine move to bribe parliment!!
